title: TV Movies
teaser: TV movies are usually an hour-long special on TV but in this game they are mashed up TV and movie titles which all share one word in common.
contentencoded:
TV movies are usually an hour-long special on TV but in this game they are mashed up TV and movie titles which all share one word in common.

Heard in Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt
